title: Oregon bird sightings: From owls and osprey to pelicans and -- peacocks?
text: BING NEWS: Oregon bird sightings: From owls and osprey to pelicans and — peacocks? Last week, we asked readers to submit photos of their encounters with the natural world, half-expecting a few dozen entries of deer. After seeing the submissions, all I can say is, wow!
